title: Pet Friendly Community! We welcome your furry friends!
posting_body: ['Birch Landing', 'Located at: 500 Maxham Rd Austell, GA 30168', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2.5 bath | 1350 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $1742/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', "When you make Birch Landing your new home, you'll step into a world of style, comfort and convenience every time you walk through your front door.", 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management, our one and two bedroom Austell, GA apartments offer exceptional features and top-quality finishes!', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '✓ BBQ/Picnic Area', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Conference Room', '✓ Controlled Access Gate', '✓ Courtesy Patrol', '✓ Indoor Pool & Jacuzzi', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Parking', '✓ Planned Social Activities', '✓ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '✓ Property Manager on Site', '✓ Public Transportation', '✓ Recreational Areas', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Sparkling Outdoor Pool', '✓ Storage Space', '✓ Tennis Courts', '✓ Townhomes Available', 'Apartment Features!', '✓ Air Conditioning/Heating', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Dining Room', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Extra Storage', '✓ Garden Tub', '✓ Handrails', '✓ Hardwood Floors', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Kitchen', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator/Freezer', '✓ Scenic View', '✓ Skylight', '✓ Trash Compactor', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Vaulted Ceiling', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup in Select Units', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a maximum of 50lbs combined weight of 2 pets.', 'There is a one-time pet fee of $300.', 'Please call for complete pet policy information.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A5EBCC31578F4B']
